v0.1.0.description:
### **Initial release for Super Cat Planet AP!!!!**

This is going to be pretty buggy but I have most of the core features I wanted!!!!
Please direct all bug reports to either the issues section of this repo or to the [discord thread!!!](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1338978189682409473)

## Setup

Actually insanely simple. CatPlanetSuperAP.zip contains the game application, which has all of the archipelago functionality built-in! Some nice stuff you can do:
- On connection screen: `Tab` cycles to next field, `Shift+Tab` cycles to previous field, `Enter` submits connection info
- Ingame: \` allows you to type to the text client, `Enter` sends a message, \` stops type-mode without sending a message.
- Main menu: Press the AP Logo to go back to the connection screen! (or press `F5` at any time, but I recommend holding the 'menu' hotkey that you set during setup instead!) You can also reset to spawn if you get stuck.

Other than that, just download and double-click `scp.apworld` and your Archipelago install will automatically set it up for you!
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
## Post-launch bugfix patch!!!
Fixed a bunch of stuff mentioned to me in the [discord thread](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1338978189682409473) (thanks for all the positive feedback!!)
also added some simple-to-implement requested features for accessibility! more coming when I have more time!
## Fixes

- fixed icon resolution
- fixed first-time-setup crash where a player could enter the game without connecting first
- fixed localhost connection problem (connection now accepts up to 5 failed attempts)
- removed a bunch of old deprecated and bad-form syntax
- fixed some minor logic and client errors I noticed while fixing above

## Changes
- added easier wind option
- added death link amnesty option
- improved ingame text visuals, also making it visible during darkness
v0.1.1.title: v0.1.1

v0.1.2.description:
# UT Support Update!!!
added UT support for the random button walls option!!! careful, it _will_ spoil what areas you have access to!
also fixed a bunch of other stuff I should have fixed a long time ago!!
## Fixes

- Fixed a crash that occurred when receiving either yellow button under certain conditions
- Fixed the Dye Shop Cat location missing from the apworld
- Fixed the Ice Caves Secret Costume not sending a check in most situations
- Fixed a softlock that occurred when leaving the options menu while already connected; now, leaving the options menu will send you to the main menu instead of the connection screen

## Changes
- Added UT Support!
- Added support for compressed websocket compression, doing away with that pesky warning on startup
- Changed the savefile name so that you can play AP without interrupting your vanilla save/config! The file location is the same.

## Known Issues
- Various collision issues which I couldn't solve. If you notice a crow clipping through a gate, or the player getting stuck on a button / wall, please let me know where and how!!
- UT gives an error about a missing YAML / failed generation, but then functions perfectly fine.
- The warp room provides access to all regions, even if they're out of logic. I plan to include the warp room as a hub when I add starting location randomization, so I have not addressed this yet.


That's all!!! Thanks for playing!!! remember to leave bug reports, ideas, and feedback in the [discord thread!!!](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1338978189682409473)
v0.1.2.title: v0.1.2

v0.1.3.description:
# Text Box Update !!
literally only changed the client! the text box now has colors and settings!!

## Changes
- Added colors to help identify item classes in the text box
- Added options to change the max number of messages onscreen, how many of them fade, and the amount of time before the messages fade

Special thanks to Kavin!!! he did basically 100% of the coloring code!! i just ported it in and then added some settings!!!
v0.1.3.title: v0.1.3

v0.1.4.description:
# Mostly bug fixes!!!

Fixed a few pretty catastrophic bugs as well as some mildly annoying ones!
# Fixes
- Fixed a bug that occurs when the player does not have a config and connects to a slot without cat rando or without strange cat rando.
- Fixed a typo that caused a button wall to have the wrong color, possibly causing impossible worlds to generate.
- Reworked the ap connection room typing fields to accept more characters, address various bugs, and make it so the text doesn't nuke itself when you click outside the window! (finally!!!!)
- Fixed void and warp room text coloring (to avoid black-on-black).
- Fixed some issues regarding escape characters in the text client output.
- Fixed the logic on one cat at the bottom left of Ice Caves, which is inaccessible when entering the region from the top with no white switch.

With this done, I should be able to add some new features soon :3 next up is probably going to just be new color schemes for the text client output, but after that I can finally start working on start area randomization!! probably not very soon though
v0.1.4.title: v0.1.4

v0.1.4b.description:
# Tiny release :)
- Fixed 1 cat with incorrect logic so that we meet compatibility requirements for strict asyncs and stuff.
- Also implemented UT yaml-less support.

All changes thanks to kavin! again!
Still probably not going to make major changes for a while since I'm very busy irl. Thanks for playing :3
v0.1.4b.title: v0.1.4b
